name: Web/App Development
description: I design and develop exceptional responsive interactive websites that utilize the latest frameworks and offer a friendly, intuitive user interface with clear navigation that adheres to your specifications.

name: Mobile App Development
description: I create hybrid mobile applications for iOS and Android devices leveraging the Ionic framework and the latest front-end web technologies.

name: User Experience Development
description: I architect and deliver exceptional user interfaces that align with your company's intended goals. I assess potential user behaviors and how users interact with your website/mobile app on different devices and browsers.

name: Search Engine Optimization
description: I utilize best practices and strategies to achieve top rankings on Google and other popular search engines.
